briefTitle: A Clinical Study to Test Efficacy and Safety of Repeat Doses of CNTX-4975-05 in Patients With Osteoarthritis Knee Pain
officialTitle: A Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled, 2-Injection, 52-Week Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Intra-articular Injections of CNTX-4975-05 in Subjects With Chronic, Moderate-to-severe Osteoarthritis Knee Pain
summary: This is a randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled, 2-injection, 52-week study to evaluate the efficacy and safety of intra-articular injections of CNTX-4975-05 in subjects with chronic, moderate-to-severe osteoarthritis knee pain.

primaryOutcome.measure: Mean Change From Baseline in WOMAC A (Pain) Dimension
